original_title: The Very Best of Kay Parker
overview: Every man's secret fantasy was and is Kay Parker. Her popularity soared in adult films during the late 1970's and throughout most of the 1980's. Kay's large and pendulous breasts are her most valuable assets to many - her most famous role was that of the mother Barbara Scott, in the 1980 porn classic "Taboo", and several of its sequels. Our collection here features scenes from "Sweet Young Foxes, Body Talk, The Untamed, The Dancers, Free & Foxy, Tomboy" & "Desire". Over the years, Kay has developed a cult-like persona with her die-hard fans, whose visions of this earth mother gone bad never seem to diminish. Join us as we present Kay's grandest hardcore samplings - served up piping hot and always with a dash of retro raunch - Kay Parker style.
title: The Very Best of Kay Parker
